description: Customize sign in and sign up experiences for users by creating and managing custom authentication extensions.
richDescription: Users with this role can create and manage all aspects of custom authentication extensions. A custom authentication extension is an API endpoint created by a developer for authentication events and is registered in Microsoft Entra ID. Application administrators and application owners can use custom authentication extensions to customize their application's authentication experiences such as sign in and sign up, or password reset. This role does not grant the ability to apply the custom authentication extensions to applications.
